footer.slogan: Gaullac Mom and Gaullac-3, Parental love for babies.

home.title: This is title
home.paragraph: Discover our premium milk powder product, specially formulated to meet the nutritional needs of both moms and babies, ensuring a healthy start and nurturing growth.
home.slogan-title: Pregnant and lactating mothers should choose Gaullac Mom / Gaullac 3 to have intelligent and healthy babies.
home.slogan-paragraph: Gaullac MOM provides required nutrients for  pregnant and lactating mothers.
home.slogan-paragraph-one: Gaullac-3 is the nutritional supplement for children above 2 years of age.

product.description: 365Brepro+ is the main advantage of Gaullac-3. The term '365' represents its unique combination of 3 types of prebiotics (FOS, GOS, Polyfructose), 6 types of core brain nutrients (DHA, ARA, Linoleic Acid, a-linolenic acid, Taurine, Choline), and 5 types of nucleotides (AMP, GMP, IMP, UMP, CMP), making it an excellent choice for babies.
product.description2: Gaullac-3 is considered the best baby formula in Myanmar as it contains all 3 essential prebiotics, which are crucial for babies. These prebiotics promote healthy digestion, improve bowel movements, and enhance overall stomach health for babies.
product.description3: Moreover, Gaullac-3 also provides 6 core brain nutrients that support brain development, vision, and intelligence. Additionally, Gaullac-3 incorporates five important nucleotides that help strengthen the immune system of babies. Furthermore, it contains all 45 vital types of vitamins and nutrients necessary for the overall growth and well-being of babies.
product.description4: Gaullac Mom provides essential daily vitamins (A, B, C, D, E, K) and important nutrients like Folic Acid, Iron, and Zinc that pregnant and lactating mothers require.
product.description5: By consuming it during pregnancy, mothers can conveniently obtain their daily nutrient needs, promoting their overall health.
product.description6: For breastfeeding mothers, Gaullac Mom supports the production of nutritious breast milk for their babies.

product-detail.paragraph: Gaullac Mom/ Gaullac 3, made by Synutra France International, is a top-quality baby formula in Myanmar. Enriched with essential Prebiotic (3), it greatly benefits babies by enhancing digestion, promoting healthy stomachs, and improving bowel movements.
